text:
@JuliaHB1 If you think Dominic Cummings is bad what about this: A self-isolating nurse, Charlotte Cole, took the "hard decision" to move George to her parents, who live five minutes away, after Covid-19 was confirmed at one of her workplaces.
Name and shame everyone now we're all nazis.
